live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. A further update will be provided at 10:09 MT. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
63114.summary: Some customers in the Silver Springs area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63114.title: June 25 - Calgary (Silver Springs) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
